  • 方法详细资料

    • updateModel

      public void updateModel(UPDATE update) throws IOException
      Updates the GUI based on the state of the game model. Manages the visibility of elements such as draw card areas, initial cards, colors, and target cards based on the current step of the preparation phase.
      覆盖:
      updateModel 在类中 GenericSceneController
      参数:
      update - The type of update to be applied to the GUI.
      抛出:
      IOException - If there is an error in updating the GUI elements.

    • onlyBlue

      public void onlyBlue(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets only the blue color checkbox as selected and clears all other color checkboxes.
      参数:
      event - ActionEvent generated by the user's interaction with the blue color checkbox.

    • onlyRed

      public void onlyRed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets only the red color checkbox as selected and clears all other color checkboxes.
      参数:
      event - ActionEvent generated by the user's interaction with the red color checkbox.

    • onlyYellow

      public void onlyYellow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets only the yellow color checkbox as selected and clears all other color checkboxes.
      参数:
      event - ActionEvent generated by the user's interaction with the yellow color checkbox.

    • onlyGreen

      public void onlyGreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets only the green color checkbox as selected and clears all other color checkboxes.
      参数:
      event - ActionEvent generated by the user's interaction with the green color checkbox.

    • onlyB

      public void onlyB(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the mouse event when only blue color selection is clicked.
      参数:
      mouseEvent - MouseEvent generated by the user's interaction with the blue color area.

    • onlyR

      public void onlyR(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the mouse event when only red color selection is clicked.
      参数:
      mouseEvent - MouseEvent generated by the user's interaction with the red color area.

    • onlyY

      public void onlyY(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the mouse event when only yellow color selection is clicked.
      参数:
      mouseEvent - MouseEvent generated by the user's interaction with the yellow color area.

    • onlyG

      public void onlyG(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the mouse event when only green color selection is clicked. Calls onlyGreen(ActionEvent) method to set only the green color checkbox as selected.
      参数:
      mouseEvent - MouseEvent generated by the user's interaction with the green color area.

    • setAllCheckBoxFalse

      public void setAllCheckBoxFalse()
      Sets all checkboxes related to color and target selection to false. Clears the selection from targetOneCheck, targetTwoCheck, bluCheck, greenCheck, yellowCheck, and redCheck.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Loads necessary images and sets up event handlers for GUI elements.
      指定者:
      initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
      参数:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • ShowErrorMessage

      public void ShowErrorMessage(String string)
      Shows an error message in the GUI and resets the colorChoose flag to false.
      覆盖:
      ShowErrorMessage 在类中 GenericSceneController
      参数:
      string - The error message to display.
